title: Updating again!
author: verias
text:
We're back, and moving forward!

Speaking of moving forward, seems like Chrys has made her way to Theresa's room... but where is Theresa? Taking another shower perhaps, getting ready for their big night?

I guess you guys will just have to wait and see!

See you guys on Thursday

Keith W.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I find my heart all a-twitter.
